headline: FedEx: B2B Mix Shift, Structural Cost Cuts, Easing Macro, And EPS Growth Support Attractive Upside
summary: FedEx (FDX) earns a Buy rating, driven by a strategic shift toward premium B2B verticals and robust cost reduction programs.

raw.headline: FedEx: B2B Mix Shift, Structural Cost Cuts, Easing Macro, And EPS Growth Support Attractive Upside
raw.summary: FedEx (FDX) earns a Buy rating, driven by a strategic shift toward premium B2B verticals and robust cost reduction programs.

headline: FedEx nabs more BMW business as part of B2B push
summary: The carrier highlighted new programs and tools in its efforts to gain volume from shippers in automotive, healthcare and other high-value verticals.

raw.headline: FedEx nabs more BMW business as part of B2B push

headline: 3 Large-Cap Stocks with Exciting Potential
summary: Large-cap stocks have the power to shape entire industries thanks to their size and widespread influence. With such vast footprints, however, finding new areas for growth is much harder than for smaller, more agile players.

raw.headline: 3 Large-Cap Stocks with Exciting Potential
